name: BasketballFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Basketball Facts”
”Alexa, ask Basketball Facts for a fact”
”Alexa, tell Basketball Facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: basketball facts
des:
Ask for Basketball Facts, and learn about the wonderful sport of basketball.

Basketball Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Basketball Facts" or "Alexa, open Basketball Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
